b10.title: Generation of expressed sequence tags and sequence-tagged sites as physical landmarks in the mosquito, Aedes aegypti, genome
b10.reason: This paper reports the first use of expressed sequence tags to identify APA sites genome-wide

b21.title: Proliferating Cells Express mRNAs with Shortened 3' Untranslated Regions and Fewer MicroRNA Target Sites
b21.reason: This is the first report that global changes in APA occur as a consequence of changes in cell proliferation
